CODIF_DATA.AA_AUTHORITY_TYPE: Ministry or any other national or federal authority

CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C03

TITLE.P: Multi Supplier Framework Agreement for the Provision of Fire Alarms and Emergency Lighting Maintenance Services

SHORT_DESCR.P: Fire alarm and emergency lighting maintenance services, the scope of which may include planned preventative maintenance and servicing, together with reactive maintenance, modifications and call out service.

Fire alarm and emergency lighting maintenance services, the scope of which may include planned preventative maintenance and servicing together with reactive maintenance, modifications and call out service.
